item.description:
Welcome to Churrascaria Braza!

 

The flavors of Brazil come alive at Hartford's first Rodizio style restaurant - where several different cuts of succulent, premium-quality beef, lamb, chicken, pork and seafood are slowly roasted on open flame and served tableside.

Braza is a steakhouse experience like no other. Braza features fixed-price continuous tableside service where the guests can choose any or all of the twelve nightly selections of beef, lamb, pork, poultry and even some fish on occasion.

 Every guest starts their meal with the unlimited sumptuous buffet of fresh salads, peel-n-eat shrimp, seasonal roasted vegetables and assorted appetizers. The guests then control their tableside meat and side dish service with a small green and red sided circular chip given to each of them. The green side signals the staff to start tableside meat service, while the red side stops the service. To resume, simply display the green side again. When you decide that you have eaten enough, simply forfeit your chip to your server and he will present you with the dessert menu.

We will be enjoying happy hour at 7pm (I will be there around 6:45, however)...great LOW prices for drafts, wines, mojitos, martinis. etc, and will start dinner at 7:30. So, come join us for this unique dining experience...an adventure for the palate!

BTW...Saturday evenings entertainment is Latin Jazz. We will be entertained by a combo playing for our pleasure. Come check it out!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or the Meetup sign...Cell is 203-808-5829
item.why: We love Brazilian Rodizio style meats!

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Bem-vindo ao Brasil... ( Welcome to Brazil !!! )
